text.section: A vehicle salesman may not fail to account for and remit to his dealership any payment received by him in connection with a vehicle sales contract.
A vehicle salesman may not do any act that a dealer is prohibited from doing under § 15-312 of this title as to vehicle sales transactions.
A vehicle salesman may not do any act that a dealer is prohibited from doing under § 15-313 of this title on prohibited advertising practices.
A vehicle salesman may not misrepresent any material fact in obtaining a license.
A vehicle salesman may not do any vehicle sales business with or through any person required to be licensed under this title if he knows that the person is not licensed.
A vehicle salesman may not willfully fail to comply with any rule, regulation, or lawful order adopted by the Administration under this title.
